TITLE: Episode 106 - On Knowledge and Virtue with Kim Schjang
DESCRIPTION: This week, my good friend Kim Schjang joins us on the porch to talk Stoicism. Stoicism is a very misunderstood philosophy and concept in the modern world. As a proponent and student of Stoicism, Kim joins us to chat about Stoicism, the virtue of knowledge, and understanding enough.
CONTENT: This week, my good friend Kim Schjang joins us on the porch to talk Stoicism. Stoicism is a very misunderstood philosophy and concept in the modern world. As a proponent and student of Stoicism, Kim joins us to chat about Stoicism, the virtue of knowledge, and understanding enough.
